p: In seven municipalities (Belo Horizonte and Simonésia – MG, Domingos Martins and Serra – ES, Maricá and Casimiro de Abreu – RJ, and Salvador – BA), adult mosquitoes were also collected using BG-Sentinel traps (Biogentes) baited with CO 2. Twelve BG traps were continuously operated per area for 3–5 days. They were installed at each 100 m (0, 100, 200, and 300 m) along three transects from the edge to deep into the forest fragments, as described in more details elsewhere [ 53].
